note: Welcome to my corner of the universe! I'm Melissa Roe, and I've been totally blind since birth, in my late 30s and bisexual. I'm a graduate student working part-time as an AT trainer while I complete my master's in special education. I live in California with my husband and retired guide dog. I enjoy podcasting, creative writing, reading, dream interpretations and discussions about spirituality and psychology. Looking forward to the connection with friends old and new.
